short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bitcoin Libre is the next generation wallet for Bitcoin, Fast Bitcoin, and Tether.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bitcoin Libre is a wallet for Bitcoin and Fast Bitcoin and Tether on the Libre sidechain. 

Visit bitcoinlibre.io and libre.org for more information.
